column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I LOVED this place. Warning
column2: parking kind of stinks but it's worth it. The food was a little on the pricier side for breakfast but I still thought it was amazing. Even if you don't want eggs or quiche or a sandwich
column3: the bakery itself has such yummy goodies. The almond croissant was amazing
column4: along with the lavender iced latte I had. I like how they have healthier options too for brunch
column5: or something heartier. The line does form outside but don't be intimidated
column6: it goes by at a good pace.
